Plot: A recounting of the chaotic events that occurred at Dallas' Parkland Hospital on the day U.S. President John F. Kennedy was assassinated.
Title: Parkland
Actors: Marcia Gay Harden, Matt Barr, Zac Efron, Mallory Moye
tomatoConsensus: Although its decision to look at John F. Kennedy's assassination through uncommon perspectives is refreshing, Parkland never achieves the narrative cohesion its subject deserves.
